picturesign.midnightconfig.title: PictureSign Config
Translucency doesn't work too great on block entities
(and therefore signs)
picturesign.midnightconfig.safeMode.tool: Only load images from trusted providers
picturesign.midnightconfig.ebeWarning: §cIf you are using the mod 'Enhanced Block Entities'
